comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver. 600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

Older user comments:

Reported on Usenet to work fine; probably works with "cdj850", too.

Printer does 600x300 in color.

The HP DeskJets 690-694 should all work fine...

Fast text-only printing can be had with the "pcl3"/"hpdj" drivers.

High quality color photo printing with the uniprint drivers.
